Text: Morning, Eta.
Morning...Gamma.

Well, it's technically already noon. I can't believe
you actually spent a whole day observing it.

Observation is the basis of everything.
Everything begins with observation.

To understand this dragon...it's essential to
observe it.

Hmm... I'd like to capture it and take it back
with us...

I understand how you feel, but that's a slightly tall
order for just the two of us.

If all of us Seven Shadows work together, we may be
able to handle it, but preparing to and then actually
transporting a dragon seems more challenging than
defeating it.
...We could harvest its cells and cultivate them...

For starters, you'll need Lady Alpha's permission for
risky experiments like that, right?

Your monster experiments already cause enough trouble
in Alexandria as they are.
Tsk...
Don't "tsk" me.
That said, the dragon hasn't moved at all.
Yeah, it hasn't... It hasn't moved all night.

I don't know when it sleeps...but it could be
sleeping all the time, just with its eyes open...

As for food...it was chewing on something. It looks
like it can store food in its stomach for days.

In that case, I wonder if it moves to hunt on
certain days...
I won't know until I observe it...for longer.
...How are things on your end, Gamma?

Well... I found a clearing in the nearby forest large
enough to drill for oil.

But I'm not sure whether we can strike oil deep under
that clearing...

I tried checking for any seeping oil or gas emissions,
as you taught me, but...
...You couldn't detect anything?

According to our lord's Shadow Wisdom, even if we
were to dig in a suitable location, the probability
of finding oil would still be about 1 in 100...

Even if we bring Delta and let her sniff around...
it will only increase our number of attempts and
won't necessarily lead to discovery.

Considering the cost, time, and effort involved
in drilling, it's an incredibly daunting task,
like trying to catch a cloud...
...But I have a big dream!

An energy revolution through the distribution
of "gasoline" and "kerosene" refined using the
"distillation technology" currently under research!

With further development of transportation networks
accompanying that game-changing move came the
expansion of related development projects such as
road infrastructure...

If we can make Master Shadow an oil tycoon,
the Garden's finances and Mitsugoshi's operations
will reach a whole new level!

I already know that... For now, just take me to the
clearing in the forest.

You could at least show some enthusiasm... Anyway,
let's wait until evening. It's better to avoid being
seen.
The clearing is up ahead. The path will open up to—
Oh... Someone's there.
*gasp* Hide!
Huh... We're hiding?
Just do it! We can spy on them from this thicket!
Hmm...
...It looks like there's at least twenty of them.

What're so many people doing...in a remote place like
this?!

Now that you mention it...you're right.
Real observant, Gamma. Good job.
Shh... Quiet. You're just obviously unobservant, Eta.
That distinct armor... It can't be!
